item.title: Best Ranked Play loadout in Black Ops 6
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/best-ranked-play-loadout-in-black-ops-6/

Black Ops 6 Ranked Play allows players to test their might against similarly skilled players for rewards and bragging rights. To even out the playing field, only certain weapons, attachments, Equipment, and Perks are available.

You can only pick from a pool of Assault Rifles, SMGs, and Sniper Rifles, so many are wondering what the best loadout is for each category. To help you dominate every map and mode in BO6 Ranked Play, here are the best loadouts to build.

  • Best Assault Rifle
  • Best SMG
  • Best Sniper Rifle

Best Assault Rifle loadout for BO6 Ranked Play

  • Primary: Model L
    • Optic: Merlin Mini
    • Muzzle: Ported Compensator
    • Barrel: Reinforced Barrel
    • Rear Grip: Commando Grip
    • Stock: Balanced Stock
  • Secondary: Stryder .22
  • Tactical: Concussion
  • Lethal: Frag
  • Field Upgrade: Trophy System
  • Perk 1: Tac Mask
  • Perk 2: Fast Hands
  • Perk 3: Double Time
  • Perk 4: Ninja
  • Wildcard: Perk Greed

The Model L is a top performer in Black Ops 6, mainly thanks to its low recoil and high damage. This makes it our pick for the best Assault Rifle in Ranked Play, especially with the attachments that aim to increase the handling and damage profile.

We’ve gone with Perks that protect you against enemy Tactical Equipment and give you more mobility, while also utilizing the Perk Greed Wildcard for Ninja. You’ll find this same Wildcard and Perk 4 combination throughout our best Ranked Play loadouts, as being able to move around the map freely without worrying about your footsteps is extremely strong.

Best SMG loadout for Black Ops 6 Ranked Play

  • Primary: PP-919
    • Muzzle: Ported Compensator
    • Barrel: Short Barrel
    • Magazine: Fast Mag II
    • Rear Grip: CQB Grip
    • Stock: Balanced Stock
  • Secondary: Stryder .22
  • Tactical: Concussion
  • Lethal: Semtex
  • Field Upgrade: Trophy System
  • Perk 1: Flak Jacket
  • Perk 2: Fast Hands
  • Perk 3: Double Time
  • Perk 4: Ninja
  • Wildcard: Perk Greed

If you’re looking for something more close-range, this PP-919 BO6 Ranked Play loadout is the one for you. With a fast fire rate, high magazine count, and attachments that aid recoil control, handling, and mobility, you’ll be shredding enemies both up close and at medium range.

Best Sniper loadout for Ranked Play in BO6

  • Primary: LR 7.62
  • Secondary: Stryder .22
  • Tactical: Smoke
  • Lethal: Frag
  • Field Upgrade: Trophy System
  • Perk 1: Tac Mask
  • Perk 2: Fast Hands
  • Perk 3: Double Time
  • Perk 4: Ninja
  • Wildcard: Perk Greed

For those who prefer a more precise playstyle, the LR 7.62 is the Sniper Rifle to use in Black Ops 6 Ranked Play thanks to its consistent one-shot capabilities.

We’ve then gone for Smokes in the Tactical slot to block off angles and prevent enemies from clocking your position from other lanes.

Which weapons have you been using in Black Ops 6’s Ranked Play? Let us know in the Insider Gaming forum.

If you want more BO6 guides be sure to check out how to unlock the new Season 1 weapons – the Saug SMG and the Kric C Assault Rifle.

item.title: Fortnite is Increasing Its Battle Pass Price in December
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/fortnite-is-increasing-its-battle-pass-price-in-december/

Starting December 1, the price of the Fortnite Battle Royale Battle Pass will increase to 1,000 V-Bucks, up from 950 V-Bucks. However, the real money cost of V-Bucks will stay the same. Players can still earn V-Bucks by progressing through the Battle Pass tiers. In addition, the price of the 25 Battle Pass Reward Bundle has been reduced from 1,850 V-Bucks to 1,800 V-Bucks.

Fortnite is making several changes to its Crew Subscription, along with increasing the Battle Pass price. Starting December 1, the Fortnite Crew will include the Music Pass and LEGO Pass at no additional cost, along with the existing benefits (Battle Royale Battle Pass, 1,000 V-Bucks, monthly Crew Pack outfits, and the bonus benefits of Crew Pack outfit styles, Rocket League’s Rocket Pass Premium). New Passes like the Fortnite OG Pass will also be added to the Crew Subscription.

Players who cancel their Fortnite Crew subscription can still claim premium rewards from the Battle Pass until the end of their billing cycle, but not for the remainder of the Battle Pass duration. Those who remain actively subscribed will not notice any changes in the system. Additionally, players who purchase the Battle Pass, LEGO Pass, or Music Pass separately from Fortnite Crew will still have the opportunity to unlock and claim premium rewards.

In other news, Fortnite’s Juice WRLD update goes live tomorrow. Also, the Air Jordan and Nike Kicks cosmetics are set to go live today. What are your thoughts on Fortnite increasing their Battle Pass price? Let us know in the comments or our new community forum!

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about the cheaters in Black Ops 6 Ranked Play. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.
